variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: FU003
variable.description: HEALTH CARE: HOSPITALIZATION (NOT JUST E.R.) SINCE LAST MEDICAL HISTORY UPDATE

variable.description: HEALTH CARE: E.R. VISIT SINCE LAST MEDICAL HISTORY UPDATE

variable.description: HEALTH CARE: DAY SURGERY

variable.name: FU006
variable.description: HEALTH CARE: ILLNESS WITH VISIT TO DOCTOR

variable.description: HEALTH CARE: CHECK UP IN INTERIM BY DOCTOR

variable.name: FU009
variable.description: HYPERTENSION: SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM HAVE YOU TAKEN MEDICATION FOR THE TREATMENT OF HYPERTENSION? (HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE)

variable.name: FU010
variable.description: ASPIRIN: TAKE ASPIRIN REGULARLY?

variable.name: FU011
variable.description: ASPIRIN: NUMBER ASPIRINS TAKEN REGULARLY

variable.name: FU012
variable.description: ASPIRIN: ASPIRIN FREQUENCY - NUMBER TAKEN REGULARLY
variable.value: NEVER, OR DOES NOT TAKE ASPIRIN REGULARLY

variable.name: FU013
variable.description: ASPIRIN: USUAL ASPIRIN DOSE FOR ABOVE

variable.description: SYSTOLIC BLOOD PRESSURE - 1ST READING (TO NEAREST 2 MM HG)

variable.description: BP CUFF SIZE - 1ST BP READING

variable.name: FU022
variable.description: PROTOCOL MODIFICATION - 1ST BP READING

variable.name: FU023
variable.description: FEMALE HORMONE REPLACEMENT: ESTROGEN USE SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM?

variable.name: FU024
variable.description: FEMALE HORMONE REPLACEMENT: NAME OF MOST RECENT ESTROGEN PREPARATION - CHARACTER VARIABLE; (BLANK) = UNKNOWN, OR NO ESTROGEN PREPARATION USE (197)

variable.name: FU025
variable.description: FEMALE HORMONE REPLACEMENT: ESTROGEN PREPARATION: STRENGTH CHARACTER VARIABLE; (BLANK) = UNKNOWN, OR NO ESTROGEN PREPARATION USE (199)

variable.name: FU026
variable.description: FEMALE HORMONE REPLACEMENT: ESTROGEN PREPARATION: NUMBER OF DAYS PER MONTH TAKEN
variable.value: HAS NOT USED ESTROGEN PREPARATION SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU027
variable.description: FEMALE HORMONE REPLACEMENT: ESTROGEN CREAM USE SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU029
variable.description: FEMALE HORMONE REPLACEMENT: NAME OF MOST RECENT PROGESTERONE PREPARATION - CHARACTER VARIABLE; (BLANK) = UNKNOWN, OR NO PROGESTERONE PREPARATION USE (207)

variable.name: FU030
variable.description: FEMALE HORMONE REPLACEMENT: PROGESERONE PREPARATION: STRENGTH CHARACTER VARIABLE; (BLANK) = UNKNOWN, OR NO PROGESTERONE PREPARATION USE (207)

variable.name: FU031
variable.description: FEMALE HORMONE REPLACEMENT: PROGESTERONE PREPARATION: NUMBER OF DAYS PER MONTH TAKEN
variable.value: HAS NOT USED PROGESTERONE PREPARATION SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU032
variable.description: PROSTATE DISEASE: PROSTATE TROUBLE SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU033
variable.description: PROSTATE DISEASE: PROSTATE SURGERY SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU034
variable.description: THYROID: SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM HAVE YOU HAD A DIAGNOSIS OF A THYROID CONDITION?

variable.name: FU035
variable.description: DO YOU DRINK BEER AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: FU036
variable.description: DO YOU DRINK WHITE WINE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: FU037
variable.description: DO YOU DRINK RED WINE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: FU038
variable.description: DO YOU DRINK LIQUOR/SPIRITS AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: FU039
variable.description: DO YOU DRINK OTHER BEVERAGE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: FU040
variable.description: BEER: AVERAGE NUMBER OF BEER (12 OZ. BOTTLE, GLASS, CAN). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL WEEK SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK BEER LESS THAN ONE PER WEEK

variable.name: FU041
variable.description: BEER: AVERAGE NUMBER OF BEER (12 OZ. BOTTLE, GLASS, CAN). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL MONTH SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK BEER LESS THAN ONE PER MONTH

variable.name: FU042
variable.description: WHITE WINE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF WHITE WINE (4 OZ GLASS). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL WEEK SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK WHITE WINE LESS THAN ONE PER WEEK

variable.name: FU043
variable.description: WHITE WINE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF WHITE WINE (4 OZ GLASS). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL MONTH SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK WHITE WINE LESS THAN ONE PER MONTH

variable.name: FU044
variable.description: RED WINE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF RED WINE (4 OZ GLASS). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL WEEK SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK RED WINE LESS THAN ONE PER WEEK

variable.name: FU045
variable.description: RED WINE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF RED WINE (4 OZ GLASS) YOU DRINK. WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL MONTH SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK RED WINE LESS THAN ONE PER MONTH

variable.name: FU046
variable.description: LIQUOR/SPIRITS: AVERAGE NUMBER OF LIQUOR/SPIRITS (1 OZ COCKTAIL/HIGHBALL). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL WEEK SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK BEER LESS THAN ONE PER WEEK

variable.name: FU047
variable.description: LIQUOR/SPIRITS: AVERAGE NUMBER OF LIQUOR/SPIRITS (1 OZ COCKTAIL/HIGHBALL). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL MONTH SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK LIQUOR/SPIRITS LESS THAN ONE PER MONTH

variable.name: FU048
variable.description: OTHER BEVERAGE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF OTHER BEVERAGE DO YOU DRINK IN A TYPICAL WEEK SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK OTHER BEVERAGE LESS THAN ONE PER WEEK

variable.name: FU049
variable.description: OTHER BEVERAGE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF OTHER BEVERAGE YOU DRINK IN A TYPICAL MONTH SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM
variable.value: NONE OR DRANK OTHER BEVERAGE LESS THAN ONE PER MONTH

variable.name: FU050
variable.description: SMOKING: SMOKED CIGARETTES REGULARLY SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM?

variable.name: FU051
variable.description: SMOKING: HOW MANY CIGARETTES DO/DID YOU SMOKE A DAY?
variable.value: DID NOT SMOKE CIGARETTES IN THE LAST YEAR

variable.name: FU052
variable.description: COUGH: DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU HAD A COUGH APART FROM COLDS? (COUNT A COUGH WHEN YOU FIRST GO OUTDOORS OR FIRST SMOKE. EXCLUDE CLEARING THROAT)

variable.name: FU053
variable.description: COUGH: DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU HAD A COUGH UPON GETTING UP OR FIRST THING IN THE MORNING?

variable.name: FU054
variable.description: COUGH: IF YES TO EITHER FU052 OR FU053: DO YOU COUGH ON MOST DAYS (4 OR MORE DAYS/WEEK) FOR THREE MONTHS OR MORE DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS?
variable.value: NO, OR NO COUGH IF FU052 AND FU053 ARE 0

variable.name: FU055
variable.description: COUGH: IF YES TO EITHER FU052 OR FU053: HOW MANY YEARS HAVE YOU HAD THIS COUGH?
variable.value: NO, OR NO COUGH IF FU052 AND FU053 ARE 0

variable.name: FU056
variable.description: PHLEGM: DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU BROUGHT UP PHLEGM FROM YOUR CHEST APART FROM COLDS? (EXCLUDE PHLEGM FROM YOUR NOSE)

variable.name: FU057
variable.description: PHLEGM: DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU BROUGHT UP PHLEGM FROM YOUR CHEST UPON GETTING UP OR FIRST THING IN THE MORNING?)

variable.name: FU058
variable.description: PHLEGM: IF YES TO EITHER FU056 OR FU057: DO YOU BRING UP PHLEGM FROM YOUR CHEST ON MOST DAYS (4 OR MORE DAYS/WEEK) FOR THREE MONTHS OR MORE DURING THE PAST 12 MONTHS?
variable.value: NO, OR NO PHLEGM IF FU056 AND FU057 ARE 0

variable.name: FU059
variable.description: PHLEGM: IF YES TO EITHER FU056 OR FU057: HOW MANY YEARS HAVE YOU BROUGHT UP PHLEGM FROM YOUR CHEST ON MOST DAYS?
variable.value: NO, OR NO PHLEGM IF FU056 AND FU057 ARE 0

variable.name: FU060
variable.description: WHEEZE: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU HAD WHEEZING OR WHISTLING IN YOUR CHEST AT ANY TIME?

variable.name: FU061
variable.description: WHEEZE: IF YES TO FU060: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU HAD THIS WHEEZING OR WHISTLING?
variable.value: A FEW DAYS OR NIGHTS A WEEK
A FEW DAYS OR NIGHTS A MONTH
A FEW DAYS OR NIGHTS A YEAR

variable.name: FU062
variable.description: WHEEZE: IF, IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, YOU HAVE HAD WHEEZING OR WHISTLING IN YOUR CHEST AT ANY TIME: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU HAD THIS WHEEZING OR WHISTLING IN THE CHEST WHEN YOU DID NOT HAVE A COLD?

variable.name: FU063
variable.description: WHEEZE: IF, IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, YOU HAVE HAD WHEEZING OR WHISTLING IN YOUR CHEST AT ANY TIME: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU HAD AN ATTACK OF WHEEZING OR WHISTLING IN THE CHEST THAT MAD YOU FEEL SHORT OF BREATH?

variable.name: FU064
variable.description: SLEEP RELATED SYMPTOMS: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, ON AVERAGE HOW MANY NIGHTS A WEEK DID YOU SNORE?

variable.name: FU065
variable.description: SLEEP RELATED SYMPTOMS: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, ON AVERAGE HOW MANY NIGHTS A WEEK DO YOU SNORT, GASP OR STOP BREATHING WHILE YOU ARE ASLEEP?

variable.name: FU066
variable.description: SLEEP RELATED SYMPTOMS: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, ON AVERAGE HOW MANY NIGHTS A WEEK HAVE YOU HAD EXCESSIVE (TOO MUCH) DAYTIME SLEEPINESS?

variable.name: FU067
variable.description: NOCTURNAL CHEST SYMPTOMS: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU BEEN AWAKENED BY SHORTNESS OF BREATH?

variable.name: FU068
variable.description: NOCTURNAL CHEST SYMPTOMS: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU BEEN AWAKENED BY A WHEEZING/WHISTLING IN YOUR CHEST?

variable.name: FU069
variable.description: NOCTURNAL CHEST SYMPTOMS: IN THE PAST 12 MONTHS, HAVE YOU BEEN AWAKENED BY COUGHING?

variable.name: FU070
variable.description: NOCTURNAL CHEST SYMPTOMS: IF YES TO FU069: IN THE LAST 12 MONTHS, HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU BEEN AWAKENED BY COUGHING?
variable.value: A FEW DAYS OR NIGHTS A WEEK
A FEW DAYS OR NIGHTS A MONTH
A FEW DAYS OR NIGHTS A YEAR

variable.name: FU071
variable.description: SHORTNESS OF BREATH: ARE YOU TROUBLED BY SHORTNESS OF BREATH WHEN HURRYING ON LEVEL GROUND OR WALKING UP A SLIGHT HILL?

variable.name: FU072
variable.description: SHORTNESS OF BREATH: IF YES TO FU071: DO YOU HAVE TO WALK SLOWER THAN PEOPLE OF YOUR AGE ON LEVEL GROUND BECAUSE OF SHORTNESS OF BREATH?
variable.value: NO, OR NO SHORTNESS OF BREATH IF FU071 IS 0

variable.name: FU073
variable.description: SHORTNESS OF BREATH: IF YES TO FU071: DO YOU EVER HAVE TO STOP FOR BREATH WHEN WALKING AT YOUR OWN PACE ON LEVEL GROUND?
variable.value: NO, OR NO SHORTNESS OF BREATH IF FU071 IS 0

variable.name: FU074
variable.description: SHORTNESS OF BREATH: IF YES TO FU071: DO YOU EVER HAVE TO STOP FOR BREATH AFTER WALKING 100 YARDS (OR AFTER A FEW MINUTES) ON LEVEL GROUND?
variable.value: NO, OR NO SHORTNESS OF BREATH IF FU071 IS 0

variable.name: FU075
variable.description: SHORTNESS OF BREATH: DO YOU/HAVE YOU NEEDED TO SLEEP ON TWO OR MORE PILLOWS TO HELP YOU BREATH? (ORTHOPNEA)

variable.name: FU076
variable.description: SHORTNESS OF BREATH: HAVE YOU SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM HAD SWELLING IN BOTH YOUR ANKLES (ANKLE EDEMA)?

variable.name: FU077
variable.description: SHORTNESS OF BREATH: HAVE YOU SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM BEEN TOLD YOU HAD HEART FAILURE OR CONGESTIVE HEART FAILURE?

variable.name: FU078
variable.description: SHORTNESS OF BREATH: HAVE YOU SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM BEEN HOSPITALIZED FOR HEART FAILURE?

variable.name: FU080
variable.description: ANY CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM OR MEDICAL HISTORY UPDATE?

variable.name: FU081
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT WITH EXERTION OR EXCITEMENT
variable.value: NO, OR NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU080 IS 0

variable.name: FU082
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT WHEN QUIET OR RESTING
variable.value: NO, OR NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU080 IS 0

variable.name: FU085
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: USUAL DURATION (MINUTES)
variable.value: NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU086
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: LONGEST DURATION (MINUTES)
variable.value: NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU087
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: LOCATION
variable.value: NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU088
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: RADIATION
variable.value: NO, OR NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU080 IS 0

variable.name: FU089
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: FREQUENCY (NUMBER IN PAST MONTH)
variable.value: ZERO TIMES IN THE PAST MONTH, OR NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU080 IS 0

variable.name: FU090
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: FREQUENCY (NUMBER IN PAST YEAR)
variable.value: ZERO TIMES IN THE PAST YEAR, OR NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU080 IS 0

variable.name: FU091
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: TYPE
variable.value: NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU092
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: RELIEF BY NITROGLYCERINE IN < 15 MINUTES
variable.value: NO RELIEF, OR NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU080 IS 0

variable.name: FU093
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: RELIEF BY REST IN < 15 MINUTES
variable.value: NO RELIEF, OR NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM I FU080 IS 0

variable.name: FU094
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: RELIEF SPONTANEOUSLY IN < 15 MINUTES
variable.value: NO RELIEF, OR NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU080 IS 0

variable.name: FU095
variable.description: CHEST DISCOMFORT: RELIEF BY OTHER CAUSE IN < 15 MINUTES
variable.value: NO RELIEF, OR NO CHEST DISCOMFORT SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU080 IS 0

variable.name: FU100
variable.description: HAVE YOU FAINTED OR LOST CONSCIOUSNESS SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM? (IF EVENT IMMEDIATELY PRECEDED BY HEAD INJURY OR ACCIDENT CODE AS NO)

variable.name: FU101
variable.description: FAINTED/L.O.C. - NUMBER OF EPISODES IN THE PAST TWO YEARS
variable.value: NONE, OR HAVE NOT FAINTED OR LOST CONSCIOUSNESS SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU100 IS 0

variable.name: FU104
variable.description: USUAL DURATION OF LOSS OF CONSCIOUSNESS (MINUTES)
variable.value: HAVE NOT FAINTED OR LOST CONSCIOUSNESS SINCE LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU105
variable.description: FAINTED/L.O.C. - DID YOU HAVE ANY INJURY CAUSED BY THE EVENT?
variable.value: NO, OR HAVE NOT FAINTED OR LOST CONSCIOUSNESS SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU100 IS 0

variable.name: FU106
variable.description: FAINTED/L.O.C. - ER/HOSPITALIZED OR SAW M.D.
variable.value: NO, OR HAVE NOT FAINTED OR LOST CONSCIOUSNESS SINCE LAST EXAM IF FU100 IS 0

variable.value: ABLE TO WALK 50 FEET WITHOUT HELP

variable.name: FU135
variable.description: DO YOU HAVE LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING?

variable.name: FU136
variable.description: IF WALKING ON LEVEL GROUND, HOW MANY CITY BLOCKS UNTIL SYMPTOMS DEVELOP? (WHERE 10 BLOCKS = 1 MILE, CODE AS NO IF MORE THAN 98 BLOCKS REQUIRED TO DEVELOP SYMPTOMS)
variable.value: NO SYMPTOMS OR ZERO BLOCKS UNTIL SYMPTOMS DEVELOP

variable.name: FU137
variable.description: YEAR SYMPTOMS STARTED

variable.name: FU138
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: DISCOMFORT IN LEFT CALF WHILE WALKING
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT

variable.name: FU139
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: DISCOMFORT IN RIGHT CALF WHILE WALKING
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT

variable.name: FU140
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: DISCOMFORT IN LOWER LEFT EXTREMITY (NOT CALF) WHILE WALKING
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT

variable.name: FU141
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: DISCOMFORT IN LOWER RIGHT EXTREMITY (NOT CALF) WHILE WALKING
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT

variable.name: FU142
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: OCCURS WITH FIRST STEPS
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FU143
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: OCCURS AFTER WALKING A WHILE
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FU144
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: RELATED TO RAPIDITY OF WALKING OR STEEPNESS
variable.value: NO OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FU145
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: FORCED TO STOP WALKING
variable.value: NO, OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FU146
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: TIME FOR DISCOMFORT TO BE RELIEVED BY STOPPING (MINUTES)
variable.value: NO RELIEF WITH STOPPING,OR NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING
NOT APPLICABLE (NOT FORCED TO STOP WALKING)OR CAN'T WALK(FU135 = 2)

variable.name: FU147
variable.description: VASCULAR SYMPTOMS: NUMBER OF DAYS/MONTH OF LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT
variable.value: NO LOWER LIMB DISCOMFORT WHILE WALKING

variable.name: FU220
variable.description: ECG LVH: R > 11 MM IN AVL
variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB, OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: FU221
variable.description: ECG LVH: R IN LEAD I PLUS S >= 25 MM IN LEAD III
variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB, OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: FU222
variable.description: ECG LVH: MEASURED VOLTAGE R AVL IN MM (1 MV = 10 MM STANDARD)

variable.name: FU223
variable.description: ECG LVH: MEASURED VOLTAGE S V3 IN MM (1 MV = 10 MM STANDARD)

variable.name: FU224
variable.description: ECG LVH: R IN V5 OR V6: S IN V1 OR V2: R >= 25 MM
variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: FU225
variable.description: ECG LVH: R IN V5 OR V6: S IN V1 OR V2: S >= 25 MM
variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: FU226
variable.description: ECG LVH: R IN V5 OR V6: S IN V1 OR V2: R OR S >= 30 MM
variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: FU227
variable.description: ECG LVH: R IN V5 OR V6: S IN V1 OR V2: R + S >= 35 MM
variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: FU228
variable.description: ECG LVH: INTRINSICOID DEFLECTION >= 0.05 SEC
variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: FU229
variable.description: ECG LVH: S-T DEPRESSION (STRAIN PATTERN)
variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB OR UNKNOWN

variable.name: FU361

SOME OR A LITTLE OF TIME (1-2 DAYS)
MOST OR ALL OF THE TIME (5-7 DAYS)

variable.name: FU395
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --DRESSING (UNDRESSING AND REDRESSING)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU396
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --BATHING (INCLUDING GETTING IN AND OUT OF THE TUB OR SHOWER. DEVICE SUCH AS: BATH CHAIR, LONG HANDLED SPONGE, HANDLE HELD SHOWER, SAFETY BARS)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU397
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --EATING
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU398
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --TRANSFERRING (GETTING IN AND OUT OF A CHAIR. DEVICE SUCH AS: SLIDING BOARD, GRAB BARS SPECIAL SEAT)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU399
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --TOILETING ACTIVITIES (USING BATHROOM FACILITIES AND HANDLE CLOTHING. DEVICE SUCH AS: SPECIAL TOILED SEAT,COMMODE)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU400
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --BLADDER CONTINENCE (ASK IF PERSON HAS "ACCIDENTS". DEVICE SUCH AS: EXTERNAL CATHETER, DRAINAGE BAGS, ILEAL APPLIANCE, PROTECTIVE DEVICES)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU401
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --BOWEL CONTINENCE (ASK IF PERSON HAS "ACCIDENTS". DEVICE SUCH AS: SUPPOSITORIES, BEDPAN, REGULAR ENEMAS, COLOSTOMY)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU402
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --WALKING ON LEVEL SURFACE ABOUT 50 YARDS (DEVICE SUCH AS: CANE, CRUTCHES, OR WALKER)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU403
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --WALKING UP AND DOWN ONE FLIGHT STAIRS (DEVICE SUCH AS: HANDRAIL,CANE)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU404
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --USING A TELEPHONE (DEVICE SUCH AS LARGE NUMBERS, VOICE ACTIVATION, AMPLIFICATION)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU405
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --PREPARING AND TAKING OWN MEDICATIONS
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU451
variable.description: NAGI: PULLING OR PUSHING LARGE OBJECTS LIKE A LIVING ROOM CHAIR

UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.description: NAGI: STANDING IN ONE PLACE FOR LONG PERIODS, SAY 15 MINUTES
variable.value: DON'T DO ON MD ORDERS OR INSTITUTIONAL ORDERS
UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.name: FU457
variable.description: NAGI: SITTING FOR LONG PERIODS, SAY 1 HOUR
variable.value: DON'T DO ON MD ORDERS OR INSTITUTIONAL ORDERS
UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.name: FU458
variable.description: NAGI: LIFTING OR CARRYING WEIGHTS UNDER 10 POUNDS (LIKE A BAG OF POTATOES)
variable.value: DON'T DO ON MD ORDERS OR INSTITUTIONAL ORDERS
UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.name: FU459
variable.description: NAGI: LIFTING OR CARRYING WEIGHTS OVER 10 POUNDS (LIKE A VERY HEAVY BAG OF GROCERIES)
variable.value: DON'T DO ON MD ORDERS OR INSTITUTIONAL ORDERS
UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.name: FU460

variable.value: DON'T DO ON MD ORDERS OR INSTITUTIONAL ORDERS
UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.value: DON'T DO ON MD ORDERS OR INSTITUTIONAL ORDERS
UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.name: FU463
variable.description: SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM, HAVE YOU ACCIDENTALLY FALLEN AND HIT THE FLOOR OR GROUND? (CODE AS NO IF DURING SPORTS ACTIVITY)

variable.name: FU464
variable.description: IF FU463 IS 1 OR 2, HOW MANY TIMES DID YOU FALL IN THE PAST YEAR?
variable.value: DID NOT FALL IN THE PAST YEAR

variable.name: FU465
variable.description: FRACTURES: SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM OR MEDICAL HISTORY UPDATE HAVE YOU BROKEN ANY BONES?

variable.name: FU486
variable.description: BERKMAN: HOW MANY CLOSE FRIENDS DO YOU HAVE: PEOPLE THAT YOU FEEL AT EASE WITH, CAN TALK TO ABOUT PRIVATE MATTERS?

variable.name: FU487
variable.description: BERKMAN: HOW MANY OF THESE CLOSE FRIENDS DO YOU SEE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: FU488
variable.description: BERKMAN: HOW MANY RELATIVES DO YOU HAVE, PEOPLE THAT YOU FEEL AT EASE WITH, CAN TALK TO ABOUT PRIVATE MATTERS?

variable.name: FU489
variable.description: BERKMAN: HOW MANY OF THESE RELATIVES DO YOU SEE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: FU490
variable.description: BERKMAN: DO YOU PARTICIPATE IN ANY GROUPS SUCH AS A SENIOR CENTER, SOCIAL OR WORK GROUP, RELIGIOUS CONNECTED GROUP, SELF-HELP GROUP, OR CHARITY, PUBLIC SERVICE OR COMMUNITY GROUP?

variable.name: FU491
variable.description: BERKMAN: ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU GO TO RELIGIOUS MEETINGS OR SERVICES?

variable.name: FU492
variable.description: BERKMAN: DO YOU HAVE MEDICARE OR MEDICAID?

variable.name: FU493
variable.description: BERKMAN: IS THERE SOMEONE AVAILABLE TO YOU WHOM YOU CAN COUNT ON TO LISTEN TO YOU WHEN YOU NEED TO TALK?

variable.name: FU494
variable.description: BERKMAN: IS THERE SOMEONE AVAILABLE TO GIVE YOU GOOD ADVICE ABOUT A PROBLEM?

variable.name: FU495
variable.description: BERKMAN: IS THERE SOMEONE AVAILABLE TO YOU WHO SHOWS YOU LOVE AND AFFECTION?

variable.name: FU496
variable.description: BERKMAN: CAN YOU COUNT ON ANYONE TO PROVIDE YOU WITH EMOTIONAL SUPPORT (TALKING OVER PROBLEMS OR HELPING YOU MAKE A DIFFICULT DECISION)?

variable.name: FU497
variable.description: BERKMAN: DO YOU HAVE AS MUCH CONTACT AS YOU WOULD LIKE WITH SOMEONE YOU FEEL CLOSE TO, SOMEONE IN WHOM YOU CAN TRUST AND CONFIDE?

variable.name: FU499
